channel.title: ::pure command
channel.description:
Well I've never added a stat mod command in PI before and would Like to know how to.
Oh, and I would love it if someone could tell me the stats for a pure xD I don't know them

item.title: ::pure command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I don’t know I never Pk’d in my life.
Time to sift through some online forums or some shit.

item.title: ::pure command
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:9, topic:427765”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=530459.msg3873454#msg3873454 date=1325512758]

No I got one of those.
I mean like what stats they usually train.
Like:
Attack: 60
Strength: 99
Def: 1
Etc etc

Are you serious right now? That isn’t Server Help, that’s RuneScape knowledge. Just use RSWiki or something, I don’t know.
[/quote]
I know I was just asking because I figured some random guy on here would know. Most people on here play(ed) runescape.[/quote]

60 attack
99str
1def
99range
1prayer
99hitpoints

Is an old-school Dds Pure, I don’t even know if people make those anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: ::pure command
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Don’t mention conventions. This is known as a Loop, edit the 7 for the stats you want.

                        if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pureorwhatever")) {
				for (int i = 0; i < 7; i++) {
			             playerLevel[i] = 99;
				     playerXP[i] = getXPForLevel(100);
					refreshSkill(i);	
					updatePlayerStats();
				}
			}

Read full topic
